p: The activity of CAT was evaluated according to the method described by Chance and Maehly [ 40], with moderate adjustments. A total of 0.1 mL of the enzyme extract was mixed with 2.9 mL H 2O 2 (30 mM). After 15 s of incubation, the absorbance was recorded nine times (20 s each time) at 240 nm ( UV-2450, Shimadzu, Kyoto, Japan). The activity of CAT (1 unit) was estimated as the quantity of enzyme needed for a 0.01-unit increase in the optical density (OD) within 1 min.
